public class LocaleWidget
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite

Utility showing styled textual locale selector acting as external hyperlinks

KBac

Method Detail

hasActiveLocale

public boolean hasActiveLocale()
Returns:
true when active Locale has been defined during setup, false otherwise

addLocale

public void addLocale(String queryName)
Adds Locale entry to the widget.

Parameters:
queryName - - locale name as part of the URL query string (http://your_host?locale=queryName) The uppercased value is going to be used for a display.

addLocale

public void addLocale(String queryName,
                      boolean isDefault)
Adds Locale entry to the widget.

Parameters:
queryName - - locale name as part of the URL query string (http://your_host?locale=queryName). The uppercased value is going to be used for a display.
isDefault - - true to indicate locale should be considered default

addLocale

                         String displayName,
                         boolean isDefault)
Adds Locale entry to the widget.

Parameters:
queryName - - locale name as part of the URL query string (http://your_host?locale=queryName)
displayName -
isDefault - - true to indicate locale should be considered default

activateLocale

public boolean activateLocale(String queryName)
Call this method to activate locale using its queryName

Parameters:
queryName - - locale name as part of the URL query string (http://your_host?locale=queryName)
Returns:
true on success when locale found, false otherwise

activateLocale

public boolean activateLocale(String queryName,
                              String defaultLocale)
Call this method to activate locale using its queryName. If queryName not found use defaultLocale as active one.

Parameters:
queryName -
defaultLocale -
Returns:
true on success when locale found, false otherwise
